name: electron-holochain-template
description: This repository helps get started with electron and holochain

scripts.install-deps: npm install && npm run happ-install && npm run web-install && npm run electron-install && npm run electron-tsc
scripts.happ-reset: npm run happ-pack && npm run user-data-reset
scripts.user-data-reset: rm -rf user-data && rm -rf user2-data && mkdir user-data user2-data
scripts.web-install: echo "remove this comment and uncomment the rest" # cd web && npm install
scripts.web: cd web && ADMIN_WS_PORT=1234 APP_WS_PORT=8888 npx serve -p 8080 dist
scripts.web2: cd web && ADMIN_WS_PORT=1236 APP_WS_PORT=8899 npx serve -p 8081 dist
scripts.web-build: echo "add a build step for web here"
scripts.electron2: cd electron && EH_TEST_USER_2=1 npm run start
